biocontainers.name: datma
biocontainers.summary: Distributed AuTomatic Metagenomic Assembly and Annotation framework

biotools.summary: DATMA (Distributed AuTomatic Metagenomic Assembly and annotation framework) is a distributed automatic pipeline for fast metagenomic analysis that includes: sequencing quality control, 16S-identification, reads binning, de novo assembly, ORF detection and taxonomic annotation.

bioschemas.name: DATMA
bioschemas.summary: DATMA (Distributed AuTomatic Metagenomic Assembly and annotation framework) is a distributed automatic pipeline for fast metagenomic analysis that includes: sequencing quality control, 16S-identification, reads binning, de novo assembly, ORF detection and taxonomic annotation.
